name: DNA Madness (LD35)
description:
You have to construct a DNA chains moving falling pieces to their couples (Adenine-Timine, Guanine-Citosine). If you achieve this, you convert a DNA chain in a wonderful animal. If not... we don't know what mutant you'll create.

Mario Alba: art, pieces design, backgrounds and animals.
mario_dae@hotmail.com

J. Felipe OveRMolo: game design, level design, code, a capella singer.
